name: Midnight Market (A TENGU KEN)
description:
Midnight Market is a game where you follow your clients and managers wishes at day and avoid being eaten by them at night ;)

This game was made for the #NoticeMe game jam from OPERA and YOYO GAMES

--------------CONTROLS

W A S D

SPACE

F

SHIFT

ESC

--------------COVER ARTIST

https://www.deviantart.com/mushmella

BOTiK o_O
